content: **knitted socks with stocking stitch and rib in 2 strands drops fabel sizes 35 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #frostedfunsocks drops design pattern fa-561 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 22-24-26 cm leg-height approx 16-17-18 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 100 off white 100-100-100 g colour 925 berries and cream **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
